fields.title: Spicy Sichuan Noodles
fields.ingredients: Noodles, Chili Oil, Sichuan Peppercorns, Garlic, Scallions
fields.description: Delicious and spicy noodles typical of Sichuan cuisine. Enjoy a fiery kick with every bite.

fields.title: Classic American Burger
fields.ingredients: Beef Patty, Bun, Lettuce, Tomato, Cheese, Pickles
fields.description: A juicy burger with all the classic fixings, served with crispy fries.

fields.title: Elegant French Salad
fields.ingredients: Mixed Greens, Walnuts, Goat Cheese, Vinaigrette
fields.description: A light and refreshing salad with a French twist, perfect for lunch or a starter.

fields.title: Assorted Japanese Sushi Platter
fields.ingredients: Sushi Rice, Nori, Fresh Fish, Avocado, Cucumber
fields.description: A beautifully arranged sushi platter offering a taste of Japan.

fields.title: Korean BBQ Feast
fields.ingredients: Marinated Beef, Pork, Vegetables, Kimchi, Rice
fields.description: Enjoy a Korean BBQ feast with a variety of grilled meats and traditional side dishes.
